content.raw: We're currently also looking at this further, and it seems as if the problem occurs on Ubuntu 12.04, but not on Ubuntu 13.04. This is not totally clear, because there are also other differences between the respective machine, but two 13.04 laptops run it just fine.
content.html: We're currently also looking at this further, and it seems as if the problem occurs on Ubuntu 12.04, but not on Ubuntu 13.04. This is not totally clear, because there are also other differences between the respective machine, but two 13.04 laptops run it just fine.
